article.title: Doss Aviation Receives Flight Screening Program Award
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Â Doss Aviation, Colorado Springs, Colo., has been awarded an estimated $23 million modification (P00038) to previously awarded FA3002-06-D-0010 for an initial flight screening program. Air Education and Training Command, Randolph Air Force Base, Texas, is the contracting activity.
